full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Team Charter Facilitation Services
## Solicitation Number: 23-223772
## Reference Number: 23-223772
## Publication Date: 2022-11-11
## Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-25 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Saving Time (EST)

## Brief Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development is hereby inviting Service Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit proposals for the provision of Team Charter Facilitation Services in support of the department's human resources and organizational development needs.

## Notice Information
The procurement category is Human Resources Services, Business Consulting/Change Management and Project Management Services (GSIN:N019BF). The notice is open only to those suppliers who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the following categories: Resource Category - 2.15 Facilitator Consultant Intermediate; Level of Expertise - Intermediate; Estimated Number of Resources Required - Up to six (6) consultants.

## Contract Status
The period of each contract will be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2023, with the option to extend the contract by up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

## Inquiries and RFP Documents
Inquiries and request for proposal (RFP) documents will be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Assane Ndiaye, Contracting Officer, via email at assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca. Suppliers should note that "buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitations. 

## Durée du contrat et option de prolongation
La période contractuelle s'étendra de la date d'attribution du contrat au 31 mars 2023. Chaque contrat comprendra une option de prolongation de la durée du contrat pour un maximum de trois (3) périodes supplémentaires d'un (1) an, aux mêmes conditions. Lorsque possible,

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canada
